parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of solid bodies to affect

title: ISweepFeatureData.IGetFeatureScopeBodies
description: Obsolete. Gets the solid bodies that the sweep feature affects in a multibody part.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of solid bodies to affect

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of solid bodies of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISweepFeatureData::GetFeatureScopeBodiesCount
before calling this method to get the value for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
